    {"instruction": "Provide an answer to the following question:", "input": "What is the purpose of the 'Selection' operation on a relation in a database?", "output": "The 'Selection' operation on a relation in a database is used to filter tuples of the relation based on a specified condition (predicate)."},
    {"instruction": "Provide an answer to the following question:", "input": "How does the 'Selection' operation work in database operations?", "output": "The 'Selection' operation works on a single relation and returns the subset of the relation that contains only those tuples satisfying the specified condition (predicate)."},
